text: atil vyaktamaya drstantannalunt. ‎ibrahiminre prarthanasthalam; avite ‎pravesikkunnavan nirbhayanayirikkum. a ‎mandirattiletticceran kalivullavar aviteccenn ‎hajj nirvahikkukayennat manusyarkk ‎allahuveatulla badhyatayan. arenkilum atine ‎dhikkarikkunnuvenkil ariyuka: allahu ‎leakarilaruteyum asrayamavasyamillattavanan. ‎
